name: TIC-80 Game Cartridge File
summary: Learn about .TIC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: TIC-80 is a free program used to create tiny 2D games that can be shared with and played by other gamers. After creating a game in TIC-80, the program creates a TIC file to store all the required information to run the game. TIC files are typically saved in cart.tic by default.
TIC-80 games can be run in TIC-80 in Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS. TIC-80 games may also be uploaded to the TIC-80 site and played through a web browser.
